lead_paragraph: A bill in the House of Representatives includes rare funding increases that its sponsors say will help carry out the sweeping legislation and spur biomedical innovation.

headline.print_headline: Washington; More Money Considered for Health Agencies
headline.main: More Money Considered for Health Agencies

snippet: A bill in the House of Representatives includes rare funding increases that its sponsors say will help carry out the sweeping legislation and spur biomedical innovation.
abstract: House will take up vote on bill that sets aside $10 billion over five years for National Institutes of Health and some half a billion dollars for the FDA in effort to hasten approval of drugs and medical devices.
